H0.text: author of the hymn great is thy faithfulness. Fanny Crosby

H1.text: author of the hymn great is thy faithfulness. Charles Wesley

H2.text: author of the hymn great is thy faithfulness. Isaac Watts

H3.text: author of the hymn great is thy faithfulness. Thomas Chisholm

A4.text: Thomas Chisholm was a Canadian physician and politician.

A5.text: Thomas Chisholm was a lecturer in the Faculty of Medicine in the University of Western Ontario in London, Ontario.

A6.text: Great Is Thy Faithfulness is a popular Christian hymn written by Thomas Chisholm (1866–1960) with music composed by William M. Runyan (1870–1957) in Baldwin City, Kansas, U.S.

A7.text: Chisholm wrote the poem in 1923 about God's faithfulness over his lifetime.
